segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I see the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and towel, looking content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running full blast, though, filling everything up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, but she carries on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is after the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks thrilled, hand inside grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out, unstable as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he tips, it'll be a big fall onto wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Little girl reaches up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light on the neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the kids' excitement is kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR
